Description: Irregular textile fragment of medium-coarse quality linen cloth, possibly coloured with yellow ochre. Edges now torn; some cutting of one transverse edge. Loose weave, due to high proportion of warp threads. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.24 ends per 10mm and weft c.7 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Possibly Old Kingdom. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
